page.title: 09A day in the life of:-
page.content:
{A day in the life of Karen Li.}
"7:30am - I had breakfast of toast sprinkled with cinnamon. After that I went to pack my things for the Destiny Run in Durham City. At 8:45am my friend Helen Short and her Mam took me to the start. After about an hours chat the run started at last. At first it seemed very easy but after a while it got harder but I enjoyed it. I finished in 38 mins 48 secs and I saw Steve Cram signing autographs near the finishing line. When I got home I had a bath then showed my Mum the badge, pen, pencil, plaque, cap and poster of Sebastian Coe which we had been given for finishing the course. 2:30pm - We went to Newcastle upon Tyne to a restaurant called 'Happiness Inn' where we had a meal.
